title: Your plan
trialWillBeAdded: The 14-day trial will be activated when you add your first product or you can active them clicking on button below.
freePlanWillBeAdded: Free plan will be activated when you add your first product or you can active them clicking on button below.
addDefaultPaymentMethod: To change your current plan, first add a payment method
addInvoiceData: To change your current plan, first add invoice data
cancelSubscriptionToDowngrade: To downgrade to the free plan cancel current subscription
changedPlan: The plan has been updated correctly. Your account information will be refreshed shortly.
errorWhenChangingPlan: An error occurred while changing plan. Please contact with support for more details.
inactiveSubscription: You cannot add a new product if you do not have an active subscription
addProductLockedLimitReached: You cannot add a new product because you have reached the limit of products in your current plan.
noPaymentMethod: To activate your subscription click on the link above "Manage subscription plan" and add payment method
setInvoiceDataAlert: Before you add payment method please add your invoice data

errors.createBillingSession: Error occured while creating subscription panel. Please contact with support for more details.

limitIsReached: The limit in your current plan has been used up. Switch to {{ nextPlan }} to continue using the application.

plan.monthDesc: net per month if paid monthly
plan.yearDesc: net per month when paid annually

invoice.title: Invoice details
invoice.emailHelp: Email address where the invoice will be sent

nip.name: VAT ID
nip.rejected: An error occurred while fetching data. Please try again or fill in the form manually.
nip.notFound: Could not find company details. Please check if the VAT ID is correct or fill in the form manually.

invoice.streetPlaceholder: Street name, building number / apartment number
